mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, u.nick_name, u.avatar, u.web_site, c.reply_user_id, r.nick_name as reply_nickname, r.web_site as reply_web_site, c.comment_id, c.parent_id, c.comment_content, c.create_time FROM blog_comment c JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN sys_user r ON c.reply_user_id = r.user_id WHERE c.is_review = 1 AND parent_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY c.comment_id ASC LIMIT #{current}, #{size}
